sub_title: Video Production and Documentary Film Freelancer / Policy and Communications Veilig Thuis ZL
summary:
Versatile generalist with knowledge and skills in project management; strategy and policy development; and communication advice and implementation. I have gained my experience in various organizations of different sizes at international, national and local level, and always linked to social problems (sexual abuse of minors, violence in dependence).

I also run my own company Wanderer Productions. I develop creative concepts independently or on assignment; prepare for production; direct during shoots and I am also skilled in editing. For example, I have been able to do beautiful productions for, among others, The Drents Museum (video installation Menyala 2023), the KNRM rescue museum (VR experience 2022), International NGO ECPAT International (awareness videos about the sexual abuse of boys 2022). My documentary films have played at several festivals, and my most recent film Limbo in Limbo won first prize at the Limburgs Film Festival (2022).

I am versatile, like to work independently and goal oriented and I am always open to new challenges. I have a critical and analytical thinking ability, I have strong communication skills and I adapt easily in various environments and/or teams. I prefer to be challenged on both content and creative level, where the result contributes to a higher social goal.

Besides work I have a deep passion for traveling and I have visited almost 60 countries. I lived and worked in Bangkok, Thailand for about 3 years. For my various studies I have stayed for a longer period of time (>4 months) in various countries (including Belgium, Canada, Guatemala, Hungary, Portugal and Tanzania). I prefer to combine my love for film/video, my need to contribute to society and my passion for traveling in work and private life. Balance is key.

treasury_media.title: SHOWREEL 2019 by YVONNE NOUWEN
treasury_media.description: Compilation of some of the films I've worked on over the last few years. Music: Chasing Self by Polar Nights Editing: Yvonne Nouwen

projects.title: International Conference Transnational Child Sex Offences: protecting children beyond national boundaries www.vgtconference2014.nl
projects.description: The 2014 VGT International Conference will be hosted in de Beurs van Berlage, Amsterdam on the 5th and 6th of November 2014 on behalf of the Virtual Global Taskforce (VGT). The VGT is an international platform focused on a cooperative approach to child abuse online and offline. The conference will harness unique international networking opportunities with experts in the field of child protection from a preventive, repressive and victim/offender care point of view. As the project manager I am responsible for organizing the program (speakers, workshops, schedule, entertainment), managing the budget, communication as well as the 'extras' such as a closing movie and extra-curricular activities.

contributors.headline: Video Production and Documentary Film Freelancer / Policy and Communications Veilig Thuis ZL

projects.title: Interviewing artists and guests at Bospop Festival 2012 and 2013
projects.description:
Bospop is a yearly music festival in the city of Weert, the Netherlands that exists since 1980. For the purpose of making a movie for all the volunteers that are working backstage I have been working together with a filmcrew to produce this film. 
My role was interviewing artists as well as visitors and staff at the Festival. Artists interviewed include: Ed Kowalczyk (Live), Los Lobos, Racoon, Within Temptation, Los Lonely Boys, the Dunwells and other musicians.

contributors.headline: Video Production and Documentary Film Freelancer / Policy and Communications Veilig Thuis ZL

projects.title: International Conference 'The Next Generation 2013'
projects.description:
I was the Project Leader for organising a two-day international conference for ca 200 guests from 16 different countries in Noordwijkerhout, the Netherlands. This conference was focused on an innovative approach against child abuse and travelling child sex offenders.
As the project leader I was responsible for content (deciding on program) as well as logistics (approaching guest speakers, venue, entertainment etc). With just a very small project group (three persons) we were able to organise a very succesful conference. We had very positive feedback on the organisation and program of the event which included both plenary sessions as well as demonstration of tools, meet the expert sessions and a social program. See twitter #nxtgn13 for responses from some of the paricipants.

contributors.headline: Video Production and Documentary Film Freelancer / Policy and Communications Veilig Thuis ZL

projects.title: Online Course on Online Child Sexual Exploitation
projects.description:
In my capacity as the capacity building officer at ECPAT International, I developed, organized and delivered an online course on the issue of Online Child Sexual Exploitation for the ECPAT Network member groups. This course consisted of 8 individual webinars which were provided and/or translated in English, French and Spanish. Sessions were provided by ECPAT staff members, partner organisations and external experts. The course was rolled out between February – July 2016 and was attended by 100 unique participants of the ECPAT network from all around the world.  

The course included webinars on the following issues (all with focus on online child sexual exploitation):
- Victim trauma
- Relevant Legal frameworks 
- Institutional fundraising
- Advocacy
- Engaging the private sector
- Victim support: good practices from the Philippines and Colombia
- Reporting Mechanisms: good practices by INHOPE and ECPAT Taiwan
- Child and Youth Participation 

Other individual webinars that were provided separate from the Online SECO Course include the following (provided in 2017):

- Child Online Protection (in cooperation with Aarambh India)
- Child sex offending: a law enforcement perspective (in cooperation with the Dutch National Police)
- Child Sex Exploitation Online: basic facts and trends

authors.headline: Video Production and Documentary Film Freelancer / Policy and Communications Veilig Thuis ZL

profile_positions.description:
Independent production of short documentaries (incl. pre/post production)
Creative concept and script development for video projects (o.a. museum exhibitions, VR-installation)
Directing video and/or audio during shoots
Guiding or executing post-production editing

Some projects I have worked on are for The Drents Museum (video installation Menyala 2023), the KNRM rescue museum (VR experience 2022), International NGO ECPAT International (awareness videos about the sexual abuse of boys 2022). I have developed multiple short documentaries (including Painfully beautiful and Limbo in Limbo) which have circulated internationally in different festivals.
profile_positions.title: Documentary filmmaker & video production freelancer

profile_positions.description: In deze rol was mijn doel om bij te dragen aan de ontwikkeling van een basisbegrip van online seksuele uitbuiting en misbruik van kinderen en jongeren, van (92) ECPAT leden en andere non-gouvernementele organisaties (NGOs) wereldwijd. Door middel van het ontwikkelen van diverse tools (o.a. factsheets), het verzorgen van online webinars en face-to-face trainingen en workshops (o.a. in Rusland, Ethiopie, Cambodia en Thailand), inzetten op bewustwording en kennisoverdracht ten aanzien van o.a. de verschillende vormen van online seksueel misbruik, relevante wettelijke kaders, relevante technologische tools en het belang van internationale samenwerking.
profile_positions.title: Trainer/ expert online seksueel misbruik van minderjarigen

profile_positions.description: Adviseren over de prioritering van projecten zoals geïnitieerd door het NPKK; Nauw volgen van belangrijke wereldwijde en nationale ontwikkelingen, kansen en risico’s om de aanpak en programmastrategie gericht op de aanpak van materiaal van seksueel misbruik/uitbuiting van minderjarigen verder te bestendigen; Verantwoordelijk voor het mede ontwikkelen en implementeren van de strategie gericht op de aanpak van kindersekstoerisme; Projectleider van diverse nationale en internationale conferenties en expert-meetings; Adviseur namens het programma in de internationale alliantie van wetshandhavingsinstanties (Virtual Global Taskforce).
profile_positions.title: Project manager Strategie en Beleid

profile_positions.description:
Korpsmonitor (onderzoek) uitgevoerd naar de aanpak van kindersekstoerisme en 'kinderporno' (op beeld vastgelegd seksueel misbruik/uitbuiting van minderjarigen) door de zedeneenheden binnen de Nederlandse politie. Dit resulteerde in een rapport met aanbevelingen, dat uitkwam ten tijde van een grote kindermisbruikzaak in Nederland (Robert M.). Het rapport werd opgepikt door het Ministerie van Veiligheid en Justitie en werd als basis gebruikt voor het herstructureren van de aanpak en structuur binnen de politie om deze misdrijven aan te pakken. Daarnaast droeg ik bij aan diverse meetings op nationaal en internationaal niveau, en fungeerde als liaison tussen het nationale programma (PVAKP) en de nationale eenheid t.b.v. verbeterde samenwerking. 

*Het PVAKP was een tijdelijk programma (2008-2012) dat was opgericht om de aanpak van kindersekstoerisme en ‘kinderporno’ door de zedenteams te faciliteren en verbeteren.
profile_positions.title: Beleidsmedewerker

company.name: Ministerie van Veiligheid en Justitie / Ministerie van VROM

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Veiligheid en Justitie / Ministerie van VROM
profile_positions.description:
Rijkstrainee in voorbereiding op de rol van beleidsmedewerker en/of projectmanager, gedurende een tweejarig interdepartementaal traineeprogramma op basis van scholing en werkervaring binnen vier verschillende afdelingen. Hierin geleerd hoe bijdragen te leveren in beleid en hoe politiek sensitief te navigeren in werkvelden waarin verschillende en soms conflicterende (persoonlijke, organisatorische, maatschappelijke) belangen spelen. 

1.	VROM-inspectie: evaluatie van interne samenwerking
2.	Programma-Directie Mooi Nederland: verkennen van problemen in overlappend beleid, regels en wetgeving op het gebied van natuur, landschap en recreatie
3.	Nederlandse Ambassade in Ottawa, Canada: stage op economische afdeling
4.	Ministerie van Veiligheid en Justitie, Directie Rechtshandhaving: portfolio kinderporno
profile_positions.title: Rijkstrainee

volunteer_experiences.description: Teaching Dutch to refugees and helping them find their way within the Dutch society

Working to contribute to universal abolition of the death penalty or moratorium instead. Amongst other things setting up actions (e.g. writing actions, petitions), responding to information requests, organising death penalty world day etc.
Volunteering at the Animal's ambulance aiding animals in need/distress in the south of the Netherlands
